commit.message:
tree-into-ssa.c (insert_phi_nodes): Add PHI nodes in variable UID order.

2009-11-30  Richard Guenther  <rguenther@suse.de>

	* tree-into-ssa.c (insert_phi_nodes): Add PHI nodes in
	variable UID order.

From-SVN: r154776
